price: Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu na Malaika wake wanamsalia Nabii. Enyi mlio amini! Msalieni na mumsalimu kwa salamu.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتَهُۥ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِيِّۚ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ صَلُّواْ عَلَيۡهِ وَسَلِّمُواْ تَسۡلِيمًا
footnotes: Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu anamrehemu Nabii wake na yu radhi naye. Na Malaika wanamwombea yeye. Enyi mlio amini! Msalieni na mumsalimu kwa salamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha wamalāikatahu yuṣallūna ʿalā al-nabiyi yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ṣallū ʿalayhi wasallimū taslīman
